SANDWICHES/PANINIS

GARLIC AND JALAPENO DRESSINGS: $1.30 Drizzle of Heartbeat Hot Sauce (2 options) can be added for free.

MONTREAL SMOKED MEAT AND SWISS SANDWICH: $10 Shaved Montreal smoked meat and Swiss cheese with homemade brule chive flour on rye bread.

CHICKEN BACON CHEDDAR SANDWICH: $12 Roasted chicken breast, roasted red peppers, bacon, and aged cheddar cheese on housemade country-style white bread.

SMOKED BACON AND EGG SANDWICH: $10 House-smoked bacon, fried egg, and aged cheddar cheese on housemade country-style white bread.

EGG & CHEESE BREAKFAST SANDWICH: $7 Fried egg and aged cheddar cheese on housemade country-style white bread.

TURKEY & HAVARTI: $10 Turkey and Havarti cheese on housemade country-style white bread.

PASTRAMI & SWISS: $10 Pastrami and Swiss cheese on housemade country-style white bread.
